Solaray Vital Extracts Passion Flower, 250 mg, 60 Vegetable Capsules is a supplement containing Passion Flower extract. Passionflower is known for its calming properties and is often used in traditional medicine to relieve stress, anxiety and insomnia. Each capsule contains 250 mg of passionflower extract, which provides a convenient dosage to take. Vegetable capsules make this product accessible to vegetarians and vegans. This product from Solaray may be beneficial for those who suffer from stress, anxiety or insomnia and are looking for natural ways to relieve these symptoms. It is important to remember that before taking any supplements, especially if you have any medical conditions or are taking medications, you should consult your physician.

Passion Flower, Solaray contains useful substances such as ascorbic acid, pectin, amino acids, tannins, saponins, potassium, and is a source of beta-carotene. Without exaggeration, the plant can be called an assistant to the nervous system. It improves the quality of sleep, regulates its duration and, moreover, does not cause unpleasant and difficult sensations when waking up. Passionflower has a calming effect and relieves headaches.
it was this passionflower that gave the best effect on the nervous system for insomnia, they tried different ones, none of them were so effective.
Great supplement! I am not taking it for the first time for the whole family as prescribed by the doctor. Convenient packaging. And good ingredients!

I recently started taking Vital Extracts Passion Flower from Solaray and I want to share my impressions. Firstly, the packaging contains 60 herbal capsules, which is convenient and allows you to use the product for two months at the recommended dosage. The capsules are small and easy to swallow, which is an important point for me. As for the effect, I noticed that Passion Flower helps me cope with stress and anxiety. After a few weeks of taking it, I began to feel calmer and more balanced. This is especially noticeable on stressful days at work, when you need to be focused and clear-headed. In addition, I noticed an improvement in the quality of my sleep. The capsules help me relax before bed, and now I fall asleep faster and sleep more soundly. This is really important for recuperating after a long day. The product contains only natural ingredients, which adds confidence in its safety and effectiveness. I also appreciated that it does not contain artificial additives and gluten. Overall, I am very pleased with the results and recommend Vital Extracts Passion Flower to anyone looking for a natural remedy for stress reduction and better sleep. This is a great choice for maintaining emotional balance!
